name: Dead or Alive Xtreme 3: Venus
description:
Dead or Alive Xtreme 3: Venus is a sports game developed by Team NINJA. It came out on 24-03-2016. Koei Tecmo Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Dead or Alive Xtreme 3: Venus is available on PS Vita.
It was produced by Yosuke Hayashi. It was directed by Yohei Shimbori.
